item.title: The way of using wire (dependency injection)
item.description: Wire is a Go dependency injection tool, open source by Google Wire is a code generation tool that automates connecting components using dependency injection. I know there are a lot of acticles writing about how to use wire in project So I won't discuss the functionality of wire in this post I would rather combine the design of injection dependency and the functionality provided by wire to talk about the correct way of using wire

item.title: How I use my Macbook Pro with keyboard only
item.description: Alfred Alfred is like spotlight vim plugin for browser I am using Chrome right now I added Vimium to my extension, and I barely use mouse for browsing website, really great tool for vim user Connect Bluetooth Device I found that I can't directly use mac built-in system-preference to connect Editor with Vim I was using IDE all the time, and most of them are great editor But I started realizing it is a little bit hard for me to control a IDE with keyboard-only, so I started using Vim as my primary editor
